name: Battle Khromatica
description:
Shmup release for Mini Jam 111

--PRESS ENTER TO START THE GAME!!!--

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys: Move around
  • Z: Fire

How to Play:

  • Let yourself get hit to change colors
  • You can damage enemies of the same color, but not ones of differing colors

Credits:

  • Aidan McEllistrem: Programming, art
  • Jude Fleischman: Music, sound
  • Eric Molina: Voice acting (Announcer)
